Old Exams for STAD29 / STA 1007

Here are (as of Feb 21 2019) the old exams, with solutions, of all the versions of the course that were run with R. Prior to 2015, the code and output was included with the exam. I've only had midterms in this course for a few years:

Old midterm exams:

Year ExamSolutionsCode/output
2016 exam solutions figures
2017 exam solutions figures
2018 exam solutions figures

Old final exams:

Year ExamSolutionsCode/output
2013exam solutions  
2014exam solutions  
2015exam solutions code/output
2016exam solutions code/output
2017exam solutions code/output
2018exam solutions code/output

There is a continuous evolution in coding style over the years. For example, 2017 was the first year I used ggplot, and I have gradually been introducing tidyverse ideas in the last few years. The coding of three or four years ago is therefore not all the same that you would see now. The statistical ideas are the same, however.
Prior to 2013, the course used SAS. I doubt that those exams will be very helpful to you.
